name: FlipFlopHop
description:
______________

FlipFlopHop Bop to the tippy top to get your gear back.

How hard can it be for one flippy boi?

You can only press space to jump forward and WASD to tilt. Use your mouse to aim where the player is looking when he's upright. In case you get stuck or just want to reset, press O.

______________

  • Textures were made in Aesprite
  • Models were created using the Unity packages ProBuilder and Polybrush together
  • SFX was created in SFXR
  • Background music is from: https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/pim-poy-pocket/

This Ludum Dare was an absolute SCRAMBLE for me. This is my second time participating in it, and it was definitely a blast. I was a bit ambition at the start like the terrain you play on in the game is entirely generated on runtime with a bunch of fun noise/randomness, so each person's session may slightly differ!

Post screenshots of your end times in the comments below!
Good luck, and happy flip flop hopping!
